title: Key EU data transfer tools in focus in Facebook, Schrems clash
text: The latest clash between Facebook and Austrian privacy activist Max Schrems could disrupt hundreds of thousands of companies as Europe's top court rules on Thursday on the legality of tools companies use to transfer Europeans' data around the world.

title: Facebook Unveils Section Dedicated To Debunking Coronavirus Misinformation
text: The social media giant is stepping up efforts to stamp out coronavirus myths on the site.

title: Hollywood Stays Away From Facebook Ad Boycott
text: The entertainment business is a big advertiser but has been noticeably silent as other industries protest the social network’s handling of hate speech.

title: Facebook will launch a new section to debunk coronavirus myths
text: A sample screen suggests that Facebook will use the World Health Organization as a trusted source for information about Covid-19, and will include simple statements of fact like "Hydroxychloroquine hasn't been proven to cure, treat, or prevent it."

title: There are calls to ban TikTok in Australia – but you should worry about Facebook too
text: TikTok denies it provides user data to the Chinese government. We look at the claims and the facts

title: Facebook's competitive advantage is its mobile offering, says Needham internet analyst Laura Martin
text: Kanyi Maqubela, Kindred Ventures managing partner, and Laura Martin, Needham internet and media analyst, join 'Squawk Alley' to discuss the stocks they are watching in the tech sector.

title: Why this strategist calls FANG stocks the 'new Covid utilities'
text: Amy Wu Silverman, head of derivative strategy at RBC Capital Markets, joins "Squawk Box" to discuss what she's seeing in tech stocks amid a record volume trading from platforms like Robinhood.
